title: About El Aleph
text:
About El Aleph
“El Aleph” is a short story by Jorge Luis Borges. It describles a point in space that contains all other spaces at once. Anyone who gazes into it can see everything in the universe from every angle simultaneously, without distortion, overlapping, or confusion. Aleph can not be described, one can only feel it. Based on the quote never stop learning, El Aleph is chosen as the name of this website.


About Me

Experience

2022 - now: Application Engineer | Infineon AG
2020 - 2022: Student Assistant | Chair of Power Electronics | University of Technology Chemnitz



Publication

Influence of Magnetic Coupling Effects between Load and Gate Commutation Loop on the Short Circuit Behavior
Temperatur Distribution of an IGBT Chip during Repetitive Switching Events under Consideration of Front-Side Aging



Education

2019 - 2022: University of Technology Chemnitz | Master of Electro-Mobility
2018 - 2019: University of Technology Chemnitz | Bachelor of Electro-Mobility
2012 - 2016: Shandong University of Technology | Bachelor of Transportation and Communication
